Module fr.cyu
Package C.Languages

Class JavaLanguage

  • java.lang.Object
    • C.Languages.Language
      • C.Languages.JavaLanguage
  • public class JavaLanguage
extends Language
    The JavaLanguage class provides methods to compile and execute Java programs. It extends the abstract Language class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      JavaLanguage()

      • compile

        public void compile​(java.lang.String sourceFilePath)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Compiles a single Java source file.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - the path to the Java source file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the compilation process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the compilation process is interrupted.

      • compile

        public void compile​(java.lang.String[] sourceFilePaths)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Compiles multiple Java source files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePaths - an array of paths to the Java source files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the compilation process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the compilation process is interrupted.

      • execute

        public boolean execute​(java.lang.String sourceFilePath)
        Executes a compiled Java program.
        Overrides:
        execute in class Language
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - the path to the compiled Java class file.
        Returns:
        true if the execution was successful, false otherwise.

      • execute

        public java.lang.String[] execute​(java.lang.String sourceFilePath,
                                  int mode)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes a compiled Java program with a mode parameter.
        Overrides:
        execute in class Language
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - the path to the compiled Java class file.
        mode - an integer mode parameter for the execution.
        Returns:
        the output of the executable as an array of Strings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the execution process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the execution process is interrupted.

      • execute

        public java.lang.String[] execute​(java.lang.String sourceFilePath,
                                  java.lang.String[] entries)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes a compiled Java program with input entries.
        Overrides:
        execute in class Language
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - the path to the compiled Java class file.
        entries - the input entries for the executable.
        Returns:
        the output of the executable as an array of Strings.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the execution process.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the execution process is interrupted.

      • execute

        public boolean execute​(java.lang.String[] sourceFilePath,
                       java.lang.String mainFileName)
        Compiles and executes multiple Java source files.
        Parameters:
        sourceFilePath - an array of paths to the Java source files.
        mainFileName - the name of the main Java class to execute.
        Returns:
        true if the execution was successful, false otherwise.

        Checks if the given program code is written in Java language.
        Overrides:
        checkLanguage in class Language
        Parameters:
        program - the program code to check.
        Returns:
        true if the program is written in Java language, false otherwise.
